name: Elemental Tower Defense (ForSync)
description:
Defend against waves of elemental enemies using 9 unique, animated towers, each with 7 synergistic upgrades. Collect currency and buff your towers with upgradable research centers. Create complex strategies by using synergies between the elements.

  • 9 unique towers(3 fire, 3 plant, 3 water)
  • Fire, plant and water research centers
  • 84 upgrades
  • 100 rounds
  • 12 different kinds of enemies
  • 9 maps
  • Cartoony pixel art graphics
